features: ❖{Broadly Compatibility Type C Hardwire Kit for Dash Cam} : TYPE-C PORT PLEASE CHECK YOUR DASH CAM PORT. Input:12V-24V; Output:5V/3A (also fits for 1A). The dash cam hardwire kit compatible with all of dash cams Car DVR, GPS Navigator, Radar Detectors and More. Also comes with Low-Profile Mini, Mini, ATO (Regular) and Micro2 fuse adapter, suitable for most cars. Leads come with protective sleeve to cover the crimps

❖{Low Voltage Protection Function Hardwire Kit}: Equipped with sensitive voltage sensing switch, the dash cam hardwire kit type c will monitor the car battery voltage in real time. When vehicle battery voltage was drops to 11.4V (12V input) or 23.2V (24V input), this dash cam wire adapter will cut the power supply, leaving enough power to ignite the engine and will not damage the battery (Anti-Interfere Magnetic Ring included)

❖{24 Hour Surveillance Dash Cam Hardwire Kit Type C}: The hard wire kit for dash cam with Mini, ACS, ATO, Micro2 add a circuit fuse holders. The dash cam hardwire connected to car battery or fuse box power, can uninterruptedly supply power for dash camera for 24 hours. Keeps it powered even after engine off, protect your car all day

❖{Easy to Install Hardwire Kit for Dash Camera}: With the dashcam hardwire kits you don’t need for cable from car cigarette lighter socket, replace it with a permanent hidden cable. Installation in minutes with little to no expertise required. Besides, We presented clips and crowbars to help you open the car insurance box. There is also a paper installation instructions. NOTE: the product is not an RF Device

❖{You will get}: You will get a total length of 13ft hardwire dash cam kit. A shielding magnetic ring included (As most of people install dash cams which interfere their car radios), it will be help you solve this problem, also come with all needed install tools, and the protective case of wire connectors at all cable connections that makes installation easier and firmer. Any problems with our items, pls feel free to contact us,we will reply you within 12 hours and won't let you suffer any loss

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: It's a must-have if you are using a dash cams in your car or truck. The dash cam hard wire kits connects the camera directly to the fuse box under the dashboard for continuous power from the vehicle’s battery, which makes the parking monitor of your dash cam working 24 Hour Surveillance!! Specification: Input:12-24V Output:5V Used for: Dash cam, Gps, Radar Detector and other car electronic devices. Power adapter: Low-profile mini fuse, Mini fuse, Micro 2 fuse, ATO (regular) fuse Compatible: Almost all kinds of cars and dash cams.

Low Voltage & Car Battery Protection Look through other dash cam hardwire kit type c, you will find that if your device keep working 24 hours, it will drain a fresh battery in one night. This upgraded dash cam hardwire kit usb c come with a sensitive voltage sensing switch, it will monitor the car battery voltage in real time. Once the input voltage is lower than 11.4V or higher than 23.2V, the hardwire kit for dash camera will cut the power supply automatically, leaving enough power to star the car. Never damage your battery! Shielding Magnetic Ring Included Most of dash cam hardwire kit usb type c will radiate electric waves outward, which is likely to interference your radio.This hardwire dash cam comes with a MAGNETIC RING. It can reduce the radiation and prevent FM/AM interference, preventing impulse current interference when you plug or pull it out, protecting your equipment better. You can enjoy your favorite station without losing the signal with this hard wire kit for dash cam type c. NOTE: the hardwire kit is not an RF Device Dash Cam Hard Wire Kit Type C This hard wire dash cam comes is TYPE C connector which suitable for almost of dash cams, GPS Navigator, Radar Detector. Meeting your requirement.

Fuses Clip This Car Dash Camera Charger Power Cord comes with a fuse clip that help you install the fuses. Opening Tool The hard wire dash cam kit also comes with a opening tool, which help you hidden the cable, let your installation look more tidy Five Types of Fuses Adapters for Almost All Cars Comes with Low-profile mini fuse, Mini fuse, Micro 2 fuse, ATO (regular) fuse adapters for you to use whatever your vehicles fuse box requires. Besides, with the seal wire connectors that will be easy for you to connect, firm connection and prevent short circuit.
Good Heat Dissipation Effect Multi-vacancy design is conducive to heat dissipation of the hardwire kits, greatly improving the service life
High Quality Copper Conductor 3.5mm transmission line, high-quality copper core conductor, the dashcam hardware kit is faster and safer to charge

Step1 Locate Your Fuse Box 1.Turn your car off and remove the key 2. Find your fuse box (Location of the fuse box is different in different cars) 3. Use circuit tester to test our constant fuse (A circuit that is live or hot all the time means that it constantly receives power, even when your car is parked and the engine is turned off) Step2 Connect this kit to fuse box 1. Take off the constant fuse (NOTE: please take a photo to remember the socket of the original car fuse) 2. Connect the hardiwre kit, refer to the connection diagram in the fourth picture. 3.Plug the fuse adapter to the original fuse socket (The socket must be the original one!!!) Step3 Connecting ground wire Connect the black ground wire to the metal of the car frame, just attached to the screw like the picture shows. Test your dash cam!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to hide, powers my dash cam. Comes with adapter for all fuse types. Fuse puller broke on first try :( and the tool for hiding the wires in the trim bent, the tools were basically useless, but I do love the kit it works great and the battery protection is awesome! Recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Works great and was also easy to install...keeps my camera automatically on when I start my car and without a wire hanging down from my mirror...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great with my car cameras!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It comes with everything you need. Can't beat the price! I found out recently that this does not work with newer vehicles that have smart charging. The vehicle voltage regularly drops below the 11.6 cutoff voltage and turns the dash cam off. Still a good buy for older vehicles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked Well to Hardwire My DashCam
reviews.reviewText: I used it to hardwire a dashcam that has front and rear cameras. So far so good. The length of the wire is more than enough. The quality of the wire is also good. You get a variety of connections for different types of fuses.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don't buy. I lost almost $400
reviews.reviewText: I installed this in my wife SUV and everything was working as expected, so I thought. I had to go in a business trip for over a month and my wife started using my car leaving the SUV at home. Two days pass and the SUV battery is dead. I'm not at home, we have to call home mechanic and he charged the battery and sayd he couldn't find anything wrong. A week later same thing, we replaced the battery (a good one, we later find out) thinking that was the issue. Few days later again. I told my wife to keep using the car until I get back. Since it was a new battery I took it to the car shop for warranty. They said the battery was fine just under charged. I told them ok but that they must honor the warranty in my next visit. So I head to the mechanic for a electrical system checkup and, off course, it came out good. Then I came to realize that the only thing done before issues started was to hot wire the dash cam with this... kit. Since we had the camera for over a year I re-plugged the original power cable and left the SUV seat for a whole week and it started without hesitation. I hot plugged back with this product and within 48 hours the battery was at 9.15VDC Unfortunately the return period is long gone and I have to keep it. With the back and forward we spent almost $400. Oh boy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The was an great additional buy for my dash cam to provide it with constant power, which makes for than perfect sense for the purpose of a dash cam. Great length to the line allow you to run, hide, and secure the line. Make sure when your installing remove all paint off of the grounding area that you intend on moment the ground lead at.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars First one was good, second one broke
reviews.reviewText: It has all of the right fuses, the first kit I bought worked great. However the 2nd kit when I was pulling the USB cable it broke :(

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 17, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: Good value and quality hardwire kit!
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this kit after reading good reviews.I'd previously powered my dash can through the 12v socket between the driver and passenger seat in my mk 7 Golf GTI but wanted to tidy this up with a permanent install.Before attempting the install I watched a few YouTube videos on how best to fit this to my model of car.On receiving the kit I found that the magnetic interference piece was missing so contacted the supplier who quickly replied and offered a partial refund with which I purchased my own.The rest of the kit seems to be of very good quality, with various fuse types to connect to the fuse box.I decided to attach to a fuse with a permanent power feed as my dash cam (Goluk T1) has a setting that automatically turns off the dash cam after the car has been stationary for 20 minutes and so far it has performed faultlesly.I'm planning to test the Parking monitoring setting on my Goluk T1 dash cam soon which would have it looping video and saving clips when either the vibration or motion sensors are activated whilst parked. This will then test the hardwire kits function for turning off power to the dashcam before the car battery gets too drained to start the engine. I will update my review at a later date to confirm how this performs.So far though really happy with my purchase, would have been 5 stars if the magnetic interference ring had been present and would have been less stars but for the suppliers quick reply and rectification of the issue.I would recomend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought a cheap dash/rear cam. Connected via cigar lighter. Then discovered they can be hard wired. YouTube showed me how now instead of only working when driving I have 24 hour front and rear cam. Great and really cheap. Bonus they can via adapter be fitted to any mini USB. Great buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Good kit not versatile for MK 2 focus
reviews.reviewText: Not that easy to fit in mk 2 focus and need knowledge of car electrics to fit, need extra wires to fit to camera it’s sugggested for particular the USB lead

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 2, 2024
Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Great Kit, if you get the right one!
reviews.reviewText: Great kit, especially how the fuse carrier allows you to ‘double up’ so you don’t need a spare slot. Just a shame I was sent micro usb instead of usb-c. Full refund given.
